name: Unknown Item
overview: Elite enemies include Vampire, Ray and Scatter. There is a limit of only 1 spawn per wave or up to 2 at higher waves.

spawn_mechanics.spawn_limit: 1 spawn per wave initially, up to 2 at higher waves
spawn_mechanics.spawn_distribution: Elite enemies share a total % spawn split between the 3 types
spawn_mechanics.hidden_mechanic: There is a hidden 0.33 repeating when the value is not divisible by 3
spawn_mechanics.display_behavior: The displayed chance jumps from 33% to 100% once the background chance for a second elite per wave also reaches 100%

spawn_interpretation.33_percent: guaranteed at least one, possibly two elites per wave
spawn_interpretation.type_distribution: Elite enemies share spawn percentages between the 3 types (Vampire, Ray, Scatter)

special_rules.drops: Elite enemies will drop Elite Cells when defeated
special_rules.on_screen_limit: 8 per Elite type (Scatter children do not count towards this limit)

vampire.attack_mechanic: Deals 2% of tower max health per second and disables all tower regen effects
vampire.attack_modification: Vampire attacks cannot be increased or reduced through perks or other modifiers
vampire.regen_disable: Tower regen, lifesteal, but not wall regen, are disabled when a vampire ray is attacking the tower

ray.attack_mechanic: Charges up for 30 seconds to fire a ray that deals 2x damage of basic enemy damage

scatter.health_reduction: Each time a split happens, the health is cut in half
scatter.drop_mechanic: Only 1 split scatter will only drop Elite Cells when defeated
